member.name: D2D1_STRAIGHTEN_PROP
member.summary: Identifiers for properties of the Straighten effect.

member.name: D2D1_STRAIGHTEN_PROP.D2D1_STRAIGHTEN_PROP_ANGLE
member.summary: The D2D1_STRAIGHTEN_PROP_ANGLE property is a float value that specifies how much the image should be rotated. The allowed range is -45.0 to 45.0. The default value is 0.0.

member.name: D2D1_STRAIGHTEN_PROP.D2D1_STRAIGHTEN_PROP_MAINTAIN_SIZE
member.summary: The D2D1_STRAIGHTEN_PROP_MAINTAIN_SIZE property is a boolean value that specifies whether the image will be scaled such that the original size is maintained without any invalid regions. The default value is True.

member.name: D2D1_STRAIGHTEN_PROP.D2D1_STRAIGHTEN_PROP_SCALE_MODE
member.summary: The D2D1_STRAIGHTEN_PROP_SCALE_MODE property is a enumeration value indicating the scaling mode that should be used.
